name: Time Vampire: MiniJam92 - Death
description:
Time Vampire is a game made for the MiniJam92.

Controls

- mouse || move camera

- space OR left-click || launch at Victims in your crosshair

- escape || open menu

- r || reload the game

Story

You play the once-immortal Time Vampire. After a reckless fight with a god inside the immortal realm, You were tossed into the earth realm thus losing your immortality. Now you race the clock to feed on humans and regain your strength to once again become immortal. But be careful, killing people is what the Grim Reaper does, and she won't like it when you start messing with her work.

The theme was death, and the limitation provided was " health is your weapon."

This game isn't perfect, but I hope it's something fun or interesting for you to play.

Best!

-Noahm1216
